text: Route of the 1987 Tour de France The 1987 Tour de France was the 74th edition of Tour de France, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Tour began in West Berlin with a prologue individual time trial on 1 July and Stage 12 occurred on 12 July with a flat stage to Bordeaux. The race finished on the Champs-Élysées in Paris on 26 July. ==Prologue== 1 July 1987 — West Berlin, (individual time trial) {| |Prologue result and general classification after prologue {| class="wikitable" |- !
